games.title: Geometry Dash
games.description: Geometry Dash is a rhythm-based action platformer where players control a geometric icon, jumping, flying, and flipping through challenging, auto-scrolling levels to a synchronized soundtrack, using simple one-touch controls while avoiding obstacles like spikes, with deep customization and a powerful level editor for user-created content.

games.title: CrosshairX
games.description: Crosshair X is a popular Windows application that lets PC gamers add customizable, permanent crosshair overlays to virtually any game, enhancing aim consistency by letting users design their own or use community-made designs with adjustable colors, shapes, sizes, and opacity, integrating safely via the Xbox Game Bar for fullscreen support without impacting game performance.
